We do not properly guard against the VM being null in many places. 
JDIDebugTarget.getVM() can return null when the VM disconnects/terminates.

Fixed. I have added doc to indicate that #getVM() and #getEventRequestManager() 
can return <null>. As well, I have instrumented all the calls to these methods 
to check & handle a null value.
